4315650.name: TET~CRAFT: The Fourth Temple
4315650.description:
Be a young god learning, as you already are - always at least one better, if not me then at least Jesus - and as he advised, re-become childlike with a new digital space Lego(tm)!

And no! You *don't* have to clean up after - nor will it hurt your (parents?) feet!

You *can* Chat remotely with friends (or the bot) through unlimited, unrestricted (and unsecured) WAN connectivity and grow your Kleinverse(s) from three basic facts (TETs) into infinite complexity, (only restricted by hardware - time, memory and storage for saves) governed by laws not unlike meta+physics and quantum+chemistry - not to mention save snapshots, called instants, which can be fully loaded by any other "player" (especially AI, who write save files particularly well, fed the python!

You create TETs (tetrahedrons/facts) by hitting the space bar, and label them by right clicking, you drag corners to other corners and join TETs together - or you can just leave them alone and some will join automatically.  This allows you to build shapes, stories, concepts, examples - whatever you like. Share them, talk about them with connected friends - of foes, whatever you like. 
Around your creation is a 3sphere that shows reflected past alternatives that look very much like stars, while when you face the future you see the black hole everything is being sucked into (defining the 5D klein-space)
You can speed up or slow down time/reactions and you can move around to look from any perspective.
There is also a bot which tries to make sense of your creation.
